casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

November, 1975

(November 6, 1975) Paul W. Thornton, Individually and as Parent and Natural Guardian of Ronald Thornton, Appellant, v Niagara Wheatfield School District et al., Respondents. (Appeal No. 1.)

— Appeal unanimously dismissed as moot in view of determination in Thornton v Niagara Wheatñeld School Dist. (50 AD2d 707). (Appeal from judgment of Niagara Supreme Court in negligence action.) Present — Cardamone, J. P., Simons, Mahoney, Goldman and Del Vecchio, JJ.
